name: Overview
data: [{"id":"351ea9f8-1308-4033-a8ca-170f43b30a7e","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Project Overview: Jarvis","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c400c47b-fd56-4cb6-a8a8-2d4075ba8718","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Jarvis","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a sophisticated static analysis framework designed to generate high-fidelity call graphs and perform data-flow analysis for Python applications. Unlike simple pattern-matching tools, Jarvis performs ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"inter-procedural, flow-sensitive analysis","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":", allowing it to track how values move across function boundaries, handle complex inheritance, and resolve dynamic imports.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8acd6001-0472-4066-b209-c05b678c4260","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The system is architected as a series of specialized layers, moving from raw source code traversal to high-level architectural mapping.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"45d8bfbe-73c8-4040-86cb-bfca9cdb1666","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"efee63ae-87ce-4fdd-83d7-cd73192e45a7","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Project Structure","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7920790d-e982-4d1c-8db4-97f7f9edc622","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1. ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"jarvis_cli.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" & ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"jarvis.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (The Entry Layer)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"243846c6-61d7-41af-bac6-b12e88aa95dc","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This is the application's surface area.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"05eb66dd-c129-4275-8b3d-de192a97326c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"jarvis_cli.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The Command-Line Interface. It manages user input, configures analysis precision, and handles the serialization of results into JSON or other formats.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"38ea6a53-fcb3-4a88-8d84-fd598261e5a0","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"jarvis.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The Orchestration Engine. It defines the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallGraphGenerator","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", which acts as the central brain of the system, coordinating all internal managers to build a unified model of the target project.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f5a804fe-b14a-4e7a-a93a-799b0283f568","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2. ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"processing/","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (The Logic Layer)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ff94f736-e838-415e-aa57-73a36fb1f531","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This folder contains the \"Workforce\" of the framework.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8df0af95-70ad-44c8-8bcc-f640a17ff930","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"AST Processors","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": These modules use Python's ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ast","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" module to walk through source code. They are responsible for identifying assignments, function calls, and control-flow structures.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"12fbbb6d-448a-4425-8431-6f13abb77d13","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Analysis Logic","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": This layer interprets the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"meaning","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of code, translating syntax into the values and relationships tracked by the machinery.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"78e96152-e032-4222-b733-21b605a5ec8c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3. ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"machinery/","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (The State Layer)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"684c9cb8-fb16-48fd-8ce3-b76850308a80","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The engine room of Jarvis. This folder contains specialized managers that maintain the \"Digital Twin\" of the analyzed program:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d79acab4-0184-4191-aaaf-8c219ae4b7e5","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Structural Foundations","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Modules like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"modules.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"classes.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"scopes.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" map the project's skeleton.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4408e7b7-e714-42e6-8f2b-cbe2cb239f45","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Data Modeling","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"definitions.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"pointers.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" track the \"points-to\" sets and historical values of variables.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fa0eb23c-95ff-4c9c-8fdc-b21c3908d074","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Execution Tracking","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"calls.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callgraph.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" record invocations and build the final dependency graph.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4bd628bf-ff2d-4a54-b8fb-feb4ac23619c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4. ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"formats/","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (The Presentation Layer)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"49ab5826-cb92-42c1-81e3-c7909366f4e6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Responsible for taking the complex internal state of the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallGraphGenerator","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and transforming it into human-readable or machine-consumable formats (e.g., Simple JSON, Graph formats, or Fasten-compatible schemas).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d6dbf56b-4804-4014-b454-9883493bd79a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5. ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"utils/","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (The Support Layer)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3c17af21-17b6-4de8-85e0-bedeb98b99dd","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Contains shared constants and helper functions (such as namespace joiners and path normalizers) that ensure all other modules use a consistent internal language.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"aaba53f4-ebca-4838-aabd-796b019d07e5","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"4633debf-734a-4206-839b-fd289ccae4d4","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Core Analysis Workflow","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5e40289e-d1d8-44a4-9671-e2a879ed5869","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Discovery","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The CLI passes entry points to the Generator. The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ModuleManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" catalogs all project files.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6205639d-fb0a-4ceb-acdf-c8bf03d0da4c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Traversal","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The Processors walk the AST. When an import is found, the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ImportManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" resolves the path and potentially triggers a submodule scan.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"84de2726-9153-4735-9ddd-8897d9eb0431","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Modeling","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": As assignments occur, the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"DefinitionManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" records \"Points\" representing value flow. If a function is called, the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" records the event.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"96f36bb4-a76f-42cc-8fba-991228549a26","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Resolution","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The system recursively resolves pointers (e.g., following ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x = y.z","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" back to its source) using the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Pointer","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" logic.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f5a6e63f-2159-4b9f-bab3-4efcc190d675","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Graphing","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": After all paths are explored, the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallGraph","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" filters out internal artifacts to produce a clean map of function dependencies.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1641279f-06b2-4ee0-b5f1-57a795cb9dac","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Export","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The chosen Formatter generates the final report.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6026ec57-e6a8-4861-af19-cc03e42e87fe","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This modular design allows Jarvis to scale with project complexity, providing deep insights into the security, architecture, and logic of Python software.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2a91a355-33d9-4903-a7a4-a5bfa16f9438","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
